definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) A division , a portion , a share , a part , a piece .
examples: We gave three deals of grain in tribute to the king.

definitions.definition: ( often followed by of ) An indefinite quantity or amount ; a lot ( now usually qualified by great or good ).

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A division , a portion , a share , a part , a piece .
secondary_definitions: ( often followed by of ) An indefinite quantity or amount ; a lot ( now usually qualified by great or good ).

definitions.definition: ( archaic in general sense ) An act of dealing or sharing out.
( card games ) The distribution of cards to players; a player's turn for this.
examples: I didn’t have a good deal all evening.

definitions.definition: A particular instance of trading (buying or selling; exchanging; bartering); a transaction .
examples: We need to finalise the deal with Henderson by midnight.
recognizing the societal deal between capital and labor regarding retirement savings

definitions.definition: ( in particular ) A transaction offered which is financially beneficial; a bargain .
An agreement between parties; an arrangement .
( informal ) A situation , occasion , or event .
examples: Their new movie is the biggest deal of the year.
I don't think that's such a big deal .

definitions.definition: ( informal ) A thing , an unspecified or unidentified object .
examples: The deal with four tines is called a pitchfork.

definitions.definition: ( slang , of a person ) A personality trait, especially a negative one, and the underlying cause of it.

main_definition: ( archaic in general sense ) An act of dealing or sharing out.
secondary_definitions: ( card games ) The distribution of cards to players; a player's turn for this.
A particular instance of trading (buying or selling; exchanging; bartering); a transaction .
( in particular ) A transaction offered which is financially beneficial; a bargain .
An agreement between parties; an arrangement .
( informal ) A situation , occasion , or event .
( informal ) A thing , an unspecified or unidentified object .
( slang , of a person ) A personality trait, especially a negative one, and the underlying cause of it.

definitions.definition: Wood that is easy to saw (from conifers such as pine or fir).
A plank of softwood (fir or pine board).
A wooden board or plank, usually between 12 or 14 feet in length, traded as a commodity in shipbuilding.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Wood that is easy to saw (from conifers such as pine or fir).
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A plank of softwood (fir or pine board).
( countable , archaic ) A wooden board or plank, usually between 12 or 14 feet in length, traded as a commodity in shipbuilding.
